title: How can we inspire people to write together for NaNoWriMo? - Quora

response.answer_text: I was unfamiliar with it, but it looks like a reasonably fun momentary break in the day that people might enjoy.  Suggestion:  Make the registration process a bit more prominent at the start.  I'd actually gone down a tree, written a line, and then found out I needed to register.  The process wasn't very clear unless I wanted to sign on with Twitter or FBook, and so I ended up back here.
